pros: The work environment is fabulous.  The campus is small and everyone knows and cares about the students and staff.  Every Wednesday there is a farmer's market which makes grocery shopping easier.
cons: Honestly there are no con's.  The benefits could be better but that's being worked on right now.

review_title: Great place to work, low pay
pros: Great place, great people, great mission, Federal bebenfits!
Great Community Environment to work. Lots of paid time off.
cons: The pay is below average for the position in other industries. They don't allow employees to work remotely when we are not in a pandemic.

job_title: Assistant Dean of Students in Anchorage, AK
cons: Financially tight and frugal with spending

review_title: Outdoor Studies Department | Equipment Room Manager
job_title: Equipment Room Manager in Anchorage, AK
pros: Great to have work location on-campus. Pay is higher than some others since you deal with a budget. Your supervisor will be one of your instructors, so if you get along well and are highly professional in your duties then it's great! You're trusted to be very independent and take the initiative to get work done as it's needed. My last year of employment was 2012. There was no option to choose lower than 2013.
cons: Hours for this position can be limiting. There is a lot to do, but it's nice to hold a different job to get more hours (money) if you need it. Can be lonely since you'll probably be working in a room all by yourself most, if not all the time.

pros: Good people who truly care about education. Low stress environment.
cons: Private and nonprofit doesn't leave a lot of profit for growth. Enjoy the pace but don't expect your resume to flourish.

job_title: Mosley Front Desk in Anchorage, AK
pros:
Great place to work
Very chill
Able to complete homework while on duty
Good experience with office organizational duties
Great for people new to the school - good way to meet new people
cons: The only con I can think of was that compensation was not great - but this was a work study position for me

pros: Very laid back, great coworkers, good environment
cons: Pay could be better, especially for this area
